definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: This is one nutritious spud as it is loaded with vitamin A and vitamin C.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種營養的馬鈴薯富含維生素A和維生素C。

sentences.english: This is one nutritious spud as it is loaded with vitamin A and vitamin C.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種營養的馬鈴薯富含維生素A和維生素C。

sentences.english: What vitamin or what is that split to lack on the side of fingernail?
sentences.chinese: 手指甲旁邊那塊裂開了是缺少什麼維生素還是什麼啊？

sentences.english: Vitamin C is destroyed when overheated.
sentences.chinese: 維生素C受熱過度就會被破壞。

sentences.english: Are vegans really at greater risk of B12 deficiency?
sentences.chinese: 純素食者患維生素B12缺乏症的風險真的很高嗎？

sentences.english: Of course, exercise and vitamin supplements can't head off all potential risks.
sentences.chinese: 當然，鍛鍊和維生素補充劑不能抵禦所有的潛在風險。

sentences.english: That includes everything from vitamins and supplements to healthy snacks.
sentences.chinese: 這包括來自於維生素的全部和健康零食的補充。

sentences.english: Vitamin injections in any case do not help tortoises to survive hibernation.
sentences.chinese: 維生素注射在任何情況下對龜龜冬眠是沒有幫助的。

sentences.english: What Are the Benefits of Vitamin B100?
This could be prevented or minimized by rectifying vitamin D levels.
sentences.chinese: 而調整維生素D含量可以減少或抑制這種副作用。

sentences.english: Contents of mineral elements and vitamins are rich in the achenia.
sentences.chinese: 薜荔瘦果的維生素和礦質元素含量也很豐富。

sentences.english: Vitamin K is an essential co-factor in calcium absorption and retention.
sentences.chinese: 維生素K，鈣的吸收和保留的合作是一個重要的因素。

sentences.english: Lower B12 levels have been associated with cognitive impairment.
sentences.chinese: 低的維生素B12水平與認知損傷相關。

sentences.english: Biotin is a kind of B-complex vitamins.
sentences.chinese: 生物素是一種B族維生素。

sentences.english: Take vitamin B2 to you can affect Morpheus ?
sentences.chinese: 服用維生素B2會影響睡眠嗎？

sentences.english: B6 vitamins can relieve some of your nausea.
sentences.chinese: 維生素B6可以緩解你的噁心症狀。

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
